title: condoras
author: condoras
content: As the title says, I have Bitcoin and I want 100 EUR PayPal at preev rate 1:1. Trusted members only or members that I have dealt with in the past and I prefer that you go first. Anyone who has the interest to fill this, post here.Thank you in advance.

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: If your Offer is still valid, i can fullfil it if you agree.Since we've already had some smooth trades I'm happy to do this trade with you.Feel free to send me your trade information as a personal message if you would like to make this trade.

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: -doubleU- on July 04, 2022, 06:58:46 AMIf your Offer is still valid, i can fullfil it if you agree.Since we've already had some smooth trades I'm happy to do this trade with you.Feel free to send me your trade information as a personal message if you would like to make this trade.Yes, the offer is still on. I just sent you my PayPal info, let me know when you send the funds, and don't forget your BTC address. Thank you.

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: Quote from: condoras on July 04, 2022, 08:47:22 AMYes, the offer is still on. I just sent you my PayPal info, let me know when you send the funds, and don't forget your BTC address. Thank you. Sorry for the late reply, I was very busy today. I sent PayPal funds to your address. Please check your messages to get my BTC address.I will confirm a succesful trade here, after i received the coins. Thank You!

comments.author: condoras

I just sent you my PayPal info, let me know when you send the funds, and don't forget your BTC address. Thank you. Sorry for the late reply, I was very busy today. I sent PayPal funds to your address. Please check your messages to get my BTC address.I will confirm a succesful trade here, after i received the coins. Thank You! Np my friend, PayPal funds were received and BTC sent. Confirm when you get them, so I can lock my thread. Thank's again for another smooth trade.

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: Quote from: condoras on July 05, 2022, 08:44:14 AMConfirm when you get them, so I can lock my thread. I just confirm that i received the Coins a short time after i send the Paypal Funds to you. Thank you for this another fast and smoth trade. We can do this everytime again if you need some Euros. Its all fine and you can lock this Thread now.
